Quick search

Download Py4J¶

You can download Py4J by using easy_install: easy_install Py4J

Alternatively, you can download the latest version of Py4J from PyPI or SourceForge.

After you have downloaded Py4J, you can follow the Installation instructions or jump to the Getting Started Tutorial.

Requirements¶

Py4J requires:

  • A Python interpreter. Py4J has been tested with CPython 2.6.
  • Java 6.0.

If you would like a particular version to be supported, fill an enhancement request.
